alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 13 at 4:10AM MST until November 13 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...The White Mountains, eastern Mogollon Rim, and the Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County. * WHEN...From noon today to 5 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. In addition, winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for lightweight and high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mogollon Rim; Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; White Mountains
